22-001SC.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Sustainable City Commission meeting of Friday, December 3, 2021A motion was made by Commissioner Skye, seconded by Commissioner Coffee, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 8 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Carla Dillon, Keisha Gaines, Rey Gonzales, Coby Skye, Sona Coffee, Hilda Gaytan and Morgan WheelerAbsent: 3 - Jenny Novak, Eric Rock and Alan Tolkoff2.

22-002SC.summary: Recommendation to receive a presentation from Development Services on the Climate Action and Adaptation Plan.Alison Spindler-Ruiz, Advance Planning Officer, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Whitney Amaya spoke.Kartik Raj spoke.Anna Christensen spoke.Pete Marsh spoke.Carlos Ovalle spoke.Elliot Gonzales spoke.Dave Shukla spoke.Kenny Allen spoke.Nancy Woo spoke.Page 2 of 6TELECONFERENCE, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, JANUARY 27, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESCommissioner Coffee spoke.Alison Spindler-Ruiz, Advance Planning Officer, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Coffee and Alison Spindler-Ruiz, Advance Planning Officer.Vice Chair Gaytan spoke.Alison Spindler-Ruiz, Advance Planning Officer, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Gaytan and Alison Spindler-Ruiz, Advance Planning Officer.A motion was made by Vice Chair Gaytan, seconded by Commissioner Coffee, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 9 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Carla Dillon, Keisha Gaines, Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Coby Skye, Sona Coffee, Hilda Gaytan and Morgan WheelerAbsent: 2 - Eric Rock and Alan Tolkoff3.

22-003SC.summary: Recommendation to receive a presentation from the Environmental Service Bureau on the City’s Waste Initiatives.Diko Melkonian, ESB Manager/Deputy Director Public Works, spoke and introduced Erin Rowland, Waste Diversion & Recycling Officer.Erin Rowland, Waste Diversion & Recycling Officer, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Whitney Amaya spoke.Kartik Raj spoke.Dave Shukla spoke.Nancy Woo spoke.Commissioner Skye spoke.Page 3 of 6TELECONFERENCE, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, JANUARY 27, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESErin Rowland, Waste Diversion & Recycling Officer, spoke.Commissioner Wheeler spoke.Commissioner Bergeron-Birge spoke.Erin Rowland, Waste Diversion & Recycling Officer, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Bergeron-Birge and Erin Rowland, Waste Diversion & Recycling Officer.Commissioner Coffee spoke.Erin Rowland, Waste Diversion & Recycling Officer, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Coffee and Erin Rowland, Waste Diversion & Recycling Officer.Vice Chair Gaytan spoke.Erin Rowland, Waste Diversion & Recycling Officer, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Gaytan and Erin Rowland, Waste Diversion & Recycling Officer.A motion was made by Commissioner Skye, seconded by Commissioner Bergeron-Birge, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 9 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Carla Dillon, Keisha Gaines, Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Coby Skye, Sona Coffee, Hilda Gaytan and Morgan WheelerAbsent: 2 - Eric Rock and Alan Tolkoff4.
